Title: Controllable Sonoro Project Research Report No. 20
Text:
Objective:
- To expand the existing Sonoro Sphere and identify weak points in the Spatial Prism Barriers.
- To contain residual Lament energy and establish control over the Sonoro.


Progress:
Field Test No. 20
- Irideglow capture efficiency increased by 4.16%.
- Small amount of Light Irideglow Crystals detected (confirmed as Lament residue).
- Stasis field collapsed after 11 minutes and 23 seconds.
- Anomalous spatial rift formed (Core coil of containment unit failed due to meltdown).

...

Status Assessment:
- Lament frequency of this period deviated by 4.23% from baseline.
- Current containment protocols are insufficient to support continued experimentation.

Remarks:
The observed periodic resets within this Sonoro are likely induced by Lament's residual power.
